alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:40PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 or more inches possible, mainly north of Route 28. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake Effect snowband will develop and affect central Herkimer County this evening, before shifting back north after midnight. For the Winter Storm Watch, Lake Effect snowband will settle southward into northern Herkimer County north of Route 28 late Wednesday afternoon and evening, then drift near and south of Route 28 later Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
